      • fitIsBetter

        protected boolean fitIsBetter(FeatureComparisonStat best,
                              FeatureComparisonStat stat)
        compares best to stat and returns true if stat is better. comparison uses all 3 descriptors, that is intensity, gradient, and theta.

        stat -

      • fitIsBetter2

        protected boolean fitIsBetter2(FeatureComparisonStat best,
                               FeatureComparisonStat stat)
        compares best to stat and returns true if stat is better. comparison checks that all 3 descriptors are smaller than their errors, then uses intensity, gradient to find best.
